title: Another crashed ship
text: Seems like this planet is a bit of a ship graveyard, but right now I'll take anything I can.
Searching through the wreckage doesn't give me what I need. A closer looks and I realise that the thrusters are working.
Its definitly a downgrade from my other ships, but at least it'll fly.
I repair the ship as quickly as I can.
Time to get of this planet. It's cost me two days and I've downgraded my ship. But I'll be glad to see the back of it and never come back.
